samples.displayName: Create and Delete Asset Simple Demo
samples.description: Basic asset lifetime example (see Window => CodeSmile => AssetDatabase Examples).
Complex example of asset create, add subasset, modify labels, save, delete, batch editing with a simple GUI (see Window => CodeSmile => AssetDatabase Examples).
